name: minus

effect.black_white: Powers up only when paired with plus.
effect.black_2_white_2: Powers up only when paired with plus.

short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

flavor_text.black_white: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
